articles.title: `I think we need...`, PAK`s Mohammad Rizwan sends warning to India ahead of Super 4 clash in Asia Cup - Zee News
articles.description: The Babar Azam-led Pakistan thrashed Hong Kong by 155 runs in their last Group A match in Asia Cup 2022 to qualify for the Super 4s on Friday night (September 2) at Sharjah Cricket Stadium in Sharjah.
